title: My pixel 2 XL is very slow, even after factory resetting.
content:
My 2XL became extremely slowly today(no plugging in charger). I rebooted it, slow. After factory resetting, still slow!! And both the rebooting and the resetting took much more time than usual.
It seems that the phone can't run more than 2 tasks at the same time. For example, when installing the updates in play store, another app in running just had no response and suggested to close.
I can't use it as normal. I have no idea how to deal with it.
Any help and advice would be appreciated.
